resources.string: Welcome to the Human Activity Recognition! Using this application, you will be able to keep track of your daily activities like walking, jogging, sitting, standing, walking upstairs and walking downstairs. Make to sure to have the phone in your front pocket so as not to adversely affect recognition accuracy.
\nPress on the start button below to start monitoring your Activity. Pressing the button means that the application will begin gathering data from the accelerometer. Press stop to stop.\n

\nPress on the TABLE button below to view activities and their corresponding confidence in real-time. Similarly, press on the STATISTICS button to view your fitness statistics over different periods of time.\n
\nNote: Put your mobile in left/right front side pocket.
Select a time period below and tap the screen to view how you spent your time.
